name: Purple & Black Immortal Rose - Handmade Recycled Metal
description:
Handmade from recycled metal, this one-of-a-kind rose is a beautiful and unique gift that will never die. Each rose is crafted from hand-bent washers and wire, creating a slightly different, individual work of art.

Key Features:
Materials: Up-cycled recycled metal washers and wire.
Colors: Lustrous metallic purple head with a matte black stem.
Finish: Powder-coated to prevent rust and provide a continuous shine.
Packaging: Comes in a crystal clear box, perfect for gifting.
Unique Gift Idea: Ideal for weddings, anniversaries (especially the 11th, which is steel), Valentine's Day, or as a way to say you're sorry.
Origin: Handcrafted in the United States of America.
Note: Each rose is handcrafted and will differ slightly from the image.
